description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference: 2023/02922/FUL dated 7th June 2024 for the Conversion of the existing property into 2no. single family dwellinghouses; erection of a rear extension at second floor level over part of the existing back addition, erection of a dormer window to the rear elevation of existing rear roof extension, replacement of existing windows to the side elevation and installation of French doors and a Juliette balcony following the removal of existing window to the rear elevation of first floor back addition (no.21); installation of a window to the side elevation at second floor level, removal of existing door and installation of 2no. windows to the side elevation of first floor back addition (no.19); erection of single storey rear extensions to the side and rear of existing back additions following demolition of external rear structures, and excavation of the front and part of the rear garden to form a lightwell with galvanised metal grill to the front and walk on glass to the rear in connection with the creation of new basements, and associated alterations and landscaping works to both properties (nos.19 and 21)." Amendments sought are for the removal of the ground floor rear extension at No.19 for a rear lightwell with walk-on grille and glazing, omit pod side window and one window on the back addition first floor level, increase depth of basement under the front foot path. Replace rear walk on glass on rear lightwell with larger walk-on glass and grille, decrease the size of the basement at the rear and the increase depth of basement under front foot path  at No.21.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
